title: Bod and the Rain
plot: One hot day Bod is sitting in a tree. He sees Frank the Postman pushing his bicycle up the hill. Frank greets Bod but says that he has to get on with delivering the post. As Frank freewheels down the hill, Bod notices that two letters fall from his postbag and are carried away on the breeze. Bod catches one letter and on his farm Farmer Barleymow spikes the other on his pitchfork. Both letters are addressed to Aunt Flo and the two of them decide to take them round to her house. At her home Aunt Flo is watering the plants in her garden when Frank arrives. He tells her that he had some letters for her but that they have now vanished. Just then, Bod arrives with the letter. It is from Aunt Flo's sister Alice in Australia. Barleymow arrives with the other letter which is from her cousin Cuthbert who lives with the Eskimos. While Aunt Flo is reading her letters the others try to water her garden but the hosepipe has a leak. But soon it begins to rain.
